doc:
Paul Shenar https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Paul_Shenar 0 Albert Paul Shenar (February 12, 1938 − October 11, 1989) was an American actor, known for portraying the Bolivian drug lord Alejandro Sosa, in Scarface (1983). Albert_Paul_Shenar ( February_12_,_1938_− October_11_,_1989 ) was an_American_actor , known for portraying the_Bolivian_drug_lord_Alejandro_Sosa , in Scarface ( 1983 ) .
